mapper.select: SELECT last_name as lastName, first_name as firstName, email, postcode, prefecture, city, block, phone_number as phoneNumber FROM members m WHERE m.id = ${id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (email, password, address, lastUpdatedBy, status) VALUES ( "${member.email}", "${digest}", "${member.address}", "none", "unapproved" )
mapper.update: UPDATE members SET email=#{member.email}, password=#{digest}, address=#{member.address}, lastUpdatedBy=#{lastUpdatedBy}, status=#{member.status} WHERE id= #{member.id}
